title: Consolidate undo system implementation
description: Resolve conflicting undo/redo implementations by choosing undoSingleton.ts as primary and refactoring useUnifiedUndoRedo.ts to use the singleton pattern. Critical for system stability.

title: Fix innerHTML security vulnerabilities
description: Replaced all innerHTML usage (5 locations) with safe DOM APIs: CanvasView.vue (2 locations), errorHandler.ts (2 locations), useCopy.ts (1 location). All uses now use document.createElement and appendChild instead of innerHTML.

title: Split large task store (1,796 lines) into modules
description: Successfully decomposed tasks.ts (1,796 lines) into modular architecture: taskCore.ts (basic CRUD), taskScheduler.ts (calendar/instances), taskCanvas.ts (canvas logic), tasks-new.ts (orchestrator). Maintains full backward compatibility while improving maintainability.

title: Add performance monitoring and optimizations
description: Implemented comprehensive performance optimizations: virtual list composable for large task lists, performance monitoring system, bundle optimization with code splitting in vite.config.ts, and optimized undo system deep cloning. Added FPS monitoring, memory tracking, and performance benchmarking tools.

title: Fix broken testing pipeline
description: Resolve ESLint configuration issues, fix test:validate command failures, and restore proper test coverage for the application.

title: Implement bundle optimization with code splitting
description: Configure Vite build with manual chunks for vendor, UI, and canvas dependencies to reduce initial bundle size and improve loading performance.
